SQL.LOAD: SELECT file_header_id, cert_number, warranty_sales_date, cert_created_date, product_code, item_retail_price, cancellation_date, refund_amt, payment_instrument, account_number, credit_card_number, customer_name, installment_amount, cess_salesrep, cess_office, sales_rep_number, sales_department, businessline, invoice_number, dealer_branch_code, document_type, identification_number, address1, postal_code, city, home_phone, mfg_description, model, additional_info, serial_number, linked_cert_number, date_paid_for, billed_amount, installment_number, record_type, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, cancellation_reason_code, file_detail_id FROM elp_daily_outbound_file_detail WHERE file_detail_id = :file_detail_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_daily_outbound_file_detail SET file_header_id = :file_header_id, cert_number = :cert_number, warranty_sales_date = :warranty_sales_date, cert_created_date = :cert_created_date, product_code = :product_code, item_retail_price = :item_retail_price, cancellation_date = :cancellation_date, refund_amt = :refund_amt, payment_instrument = :payment_instrument, account_number = :account_number, credit_card_number = :credit_card_number, customer_name = :customer_name, installment_amount = :installment_amount, cess_salesrep = :cess_salesrep, cess_office = :cess_office, sales_rep_number = :sales_rep_number, sales_department = :sales_department, businessline = :businessline, invoice_number = :invoice_number, dealer_branch_code = :dealer_branch_code, document_type = :document_type, identification_number = :identification_number, address1 = :address1, postal_code = :postal_code, city = :city, home_phone = :home_phone, mfg_description = :mfg_description, model = :model, additional_info = :additional_info, serial_number = :serial_number, linked_cert_number = :linked_cert_number, date_paid_for = :date_paid_for, billed_amount = :billed_amount, installment_number = :installment_number, record_type = :record_type, cancellation_reason_code = :cancellation_reason_code, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE file_detail_id = :file_detail_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_daily_outbound_file_detail ( file_header_id, cert_number, warranty_sales_date, cert_created_date, product_code, item_retail_price, cancellation_date, refund_amt, payment_instrument, account_number, credit_card_number, customer_name, installment_amount, cess_salesrep, cess_office, sales_rep_number, sales_department, businessline, invoice_number, dealer_branch_code, document_type, identification_number, address1, postal_code, city, home_phone, mfg_description, model, additional_info, serial_number, linked_cert_number, date_paid_for, billed_amount, installment_number, record_type, cancellation_reason_code, created_by, file_detail_id ) VALUES ( :file_header_id, :cert_number, :warranty_sales_date, :cert_created_date, :product_code, :item_retail_price, :cancellation_date, :refund_amt, :payment_instrument, :account_number, :credit_card_number, :customer_name, :installment_amount, :cess_salesrep, :cess_office, :sales_rep_number, :sales_department, :businessline, :invoice_number, :dealer_branch_code, :document_type, :identification_number, :address1, :postal_code, :city, :home_phone, :mfg_description, :model, :additional_info, :serial_number, :linked_cert_number, :date_paid_for, :billed_amount, :installment_number, :record_type, :cancellation_reason_code, :created_by, :file_detail_id )
